extendedInfo.description: m> notes notepad is a simple but elegant notepad app for making text notes just about anything.m> notes notepad is designed to be convenient to use and makes it easy to focus on what's important - your notes' content and context. m> notes is a great app for writing notes, memo, shopping list or any other list of things you want to remember or just review later. With m>notes notepad it's easy to organize your notes into colorful notebooks.Slide navigation and Android Action Bar (enabled even for v2.3 devices) allow you to browse your collection of notes quickly and without much effort. Use beautiful icons and notebook colors to add flavor to your collection of notes.Key Features:- Consistent sliding navigation- Organize your notes and sub-notes into colored notebooks- Add photos to your notes, make photos with your camera or choose a picture from the gallery- Action Bar provides context information even on older devices- Drag and drop to reorder notes- Share your notes via Twitter, Facebook, email, etc.Premium Features:- Widgets- 8 fonts to choose from- Additional icons- Unlimited notebooks- Imports notebooks and notes from the free versionWith m>notes notes and notebooks you can:**Organize your notes into colored notebooksPick vivid colors for your bright ideas and memories. Select color for every notepad.**Slide through your notes and notepadsSlide left and right to navigate through your notebooks and notes. m>notes is the first android notebook with consistent sliding navigation. **Reorder notes in every notepad with easeDrag and drop your notes to order logically. m>notes inserts your new notes at the top or at the bottom of the list depending on your preferences. Then you may drag and drop it anywhere in the list.**Share your notesm>notes allows you to share notes from your notepad with your friends via Twitter, Facebook, Email, SMS or any other sharing tool. **Select beautiful fontm>notes has 8 beautiful rare fonts and also features exclusive handwritten Kolbaska font that improves remembering**Label important thingsMark important things with color icons. Every note may have its own icon.**Note everythingCreate many colored notepads and make notes just about anything. **Import notes from free version Switch to the paid version and import all your notes in one tap.Keywords: notepad, notes, notepad app, notebook, notepad with icons, organizer, beautiful notes, widget, notepad with photos, catch replacement

reviews.title: Suggestion for improvement
reviews.comment: I\'ve just bought the application m> notes, and I make the following suggestion for improvement. It would be good that could sort the notebooks. Sometimes the last book you introduce is the most important and you want to display it the first.    Regards, and congratulations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and nice, but...
reviews.comment: Easy and simple notes management, but it would be a lot better if it had a bit larger buttons in the menus. I hope this to be corrected in a next update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply not good enough.
reviews.comment: I like simple but this app is too simple. Private DIARY by Mihalich DS Group is a 100\303\227 better. This app won\'t allow my keyboard to use word prediction, why not?  It won\'t even let me edit my headings, nor anything else. I was hoping for something different, not is this not different it\'s under par & has nothing to offer. Glad I didn\'t buy it. Even in a free version I\'d expect to be able to do the above.
reviews.author: Helga Hayward
